jump_scares.spoiler: A homeless man bangs on the door of the taxi
Julia stares at her reflection in the window and it abruptly changes to another image of her looking distressed
Julia sees a dead rat
There is a metallic bang from the other side of a door
There is a loud noise and visual disturbance from the camera feed that Julia and Dennis are watching
The door unlocks and opens as Julia is walking away
A dog barking may startle some viewers
Julia walks into a bucket
Julia shines her torch on a girl sitting hunched over on a bed
Julia stands on a baby doll causing it to make a laughing noise
A figure moves quickly past a window
Julia shines the torch on a disfigured person
A distressed Julia suddenly appears out of the darkness
A shadowy figure passes behind Jim
A silhouette can be seen standing right behind Jim
Children can be seen on the security footage peeking at Dennis from behind some pillars
There is a loud noise and Dennis’s wheelchair begins to shake
The girl hovering on the ceiling turns her head
There is a loud noise from behind Dennis
There is a scream and Dennis is pushed off his wheelchair
Julia shines the torch on Jim’s bloodied face
